alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A DEVELOPING CLUSTER OF THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN AND CLARK COUNTIES, AND MADISON AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, a rapidly developing thunderstorm was located near Springfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Dublin, Urbana, London, Plain City, West Jefferson, South Charleston, Mechanicsburg, Choctaw Lake, New California, Harmony, Lisbon, Brighton, Lafayette, South Vienna, Tremont City, Woodstock, Catawba, Unionville Center and Mutual. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 53 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
